Package Instructions

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
Instructions.MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants, ScreenSwitcher
public class MainMenu extends processing.core.PApplet implements ScreenSwitcher
This class represents the main menu that manages all the screens and switches the screens based on user input (buttons clicked).
Author:
Stephen
